programme.title: Celebrity Wheel of Fortune S5
programme.desc: Hosted by Pat Sajak and Vanna White, "Celebrity Wheel of Fortune" welcomes celebrities to solve word puzzles for a chance to win up to $1 million. All of the money won goes to a charity of their choice.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Sandokan and his crew board a ship and free a captive, who is convinced the pirate is the warrior from an old prophecy. Landing in Labuan in disguise, Sandokan meets Marianne, the consul's daughter and clashes with Brooke, a pirate hunter.

programme.title: Matlock S2
programme.desc: Follow Madeline Matlock as she rejoins the work force at a prestigious law firm, where she uses her wily tactics to win cases and expose wrongdoing.

programme.title: Entertainment Tonight

programme.title: Top Chef S21

programme.title: Project Runway S21
programme.desc: Working with real people as their clients, the designers must create looks for a night on the town that include a jaw-dropping reveal.

programme.title: Sheriff Country S1
programme.desc: A high-stakes transport mission puts Sheriff Mickey Fox and Deputy Boone on edge as they race against time to protect a vulnerable witness.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: All season the chefs have been growing gardens at their Kentucky estate. Tom ambushes the sleeping chefs and challenges them to reap what they sowed and make a dish focused on their garden harvest. Then, for the last elimination challenge in Kentucky, the chefs head to Keeneland, a thoroughbred horse auction house, to bid on luxury ingredients for dishes to show gratitude to their culinary mentors. Chefs Bryan Voltaggio, Gavin Kaysen, JD Fratzke, Kim Alter, David Posey and Chris Coombs join the judges to see how far the Chefs have come and who deserves to go to Macau for the finals.

programme.title: Top Chef S16
programme.desc: The final five chefs travel to the Chinese territory of Macau for the remaining battles of the competition. Judge Graham Elliot, who has a restaurant in Macau, introduces the Chefs to the local market full of fascinating ingredients and challenges them to a Quickfire highlighting unique Macanese proteins. Then, the chefs throw a party celebrating Chinese New Year. Since it is the Year of the Pig, the dishes must feature pork products and be delicious enough to impress Hong Kong’s super chef Jowett Yu along with Tom, Padma and Graham.

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: JESS and the pups give Baa a peach to eat, thinking it will make a change from grass. But the peach is too hard. How can I make my peach soft? Asks Jess. That's the Big Question! He asks Mimi and watches her kneading clay. She explains she's making the clay soft. Jess tries throwing the peach in the air to soften it but all it does is bruise. Horace tells them that the water in his pond keeps his skin soft so Jess and the pups try to soften the peach in water. But it's still hard. They visit Willow who offers the pups some of her lovely ripe cherries. She explains that the cherries went soft and changed colour when they ripened. Jess realises it's the same for the peach. He waits for it to ripen and then gives it to Baa. It's delicious! And now Jess knows how to make a peach soft. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess, Mimi, Baa and Billie are playing a game, kicking a fir cone into a bucket. But it's so cold that poor shivering Billie can't kick properly. They need to find a way Bilie can stay warm enough. Baa's never cold because of his wool. They find a clump of Baa's wool on the ground but it just falls off Billie when Jess puts it on her – and Mimi tells them that glueing it on's a bad idea. What happens when it's summer and Billie wants to be cool? Maybe wrapping her in it, like a blanket, is the answer? It definitely keeps her warm - only problem is, she can't move! They realise that Baa wears a scarf as well. Perhaps they need a scarf for Billie? Mimi knits a tiny scarf for Billie, after twisting the clump of wool into yarn. It's perfect! Billie's toasty warm for their game of Flying Fircones. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: JESS, JOEY and JINX go to the Whispering Woods in the hope of seeing some butterflies, but the puppies are so lively and noisy that they frighten them away. JESS wonders “how can we hide to watch butterflies?” That's the Big Question! JESS decides to make somewhere to hide out of natural materials. The puppies and Jess try to build a hide out of stones but they're too heavy and all fall down. Jess thinks that something lighter might work well but when they try to build a hide out of straw it's TOO light and flies away in the wind. JESS is stuck - there must be some other material on Greendale Farm they could use. But all that's around them are trees. Jess works out that trees are made out of wood and there are lots of old wooden apple crates in Willow's Stable which will do the job perfectly. JESS, JOEY and JINX build a butterfly hide out of wooden apple crates and soon see lots and lots of beautiful butterflies. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: It's a snowy day on Greendale Farm so Jess and his friends have a race down Cherry Hill. Jess wants to win the race but he can't run as fast in the snow. “How can I go faster than Joey and Jinx?” Thinks Jess. That's the Big Question. First, Jess tries rolling down the hill like the puppies but he's not a good roller so that doesn't work. Horace shows Jess how he slides down his slide in the pond. Jess tries again at Cherry Hill but can't get going. Helped by Billie and Baa he remembers everything that Horace did - pushing off, going ‘Wheeeee! and lifting his legs up - but nothing works; he ends up sitting in the snow and not sliding at all. He needs something that will move on its own like Mimi's trolley! Jess tries sliding down the hill on the trolley but the wheels get stuck in the snow. Jess decides to take the wheels off and see if the trolley moves faster. Jess whizzes down the hill on the trolley top much faster than the rolling puppies. It's brilliant fun and he's answered the question. Yippety Ya

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: It's Harvest time and Jess and his friends are having a special harvest breakfast. But all there is to eat is grass! Jess wonders, “What shall we have for our harvest breakfast?” That's the Big Question! Baa likes juicy things to eat. Jess remembers that he saw some juicy blackberries on his way to Buttercup Meadow. He and Baa go and pick some. They taste delicious, but it's still not quite perfect. Billie wants something crunchy. Jess remembers seeing some crunchy hazelnuts on the way to the blackberries. He and Billie go and collect some hazelnuts. Juicy and crunchy is fantastic, but it's still not perfect. “What about something chewy” suggests Willow. Jess remembers that he and Billie found some chewy oats on their way to the hazelnut tree. So he and Willow fetch some oats. It's tasty but it's still a bit dry – until Jess adds the final touch - some milk. Perfect! They've made delicious juicy-crunchy-chewy-mushy muesli! And what's more, Jess has answered his Big Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and Mimi are decorating hats. Mimi can't decide which of her two hats to wear – the one decorated with flowers or the one decorated with berries? It's a Big Question to answer! Baa and Billie are having fun making shadow shapes on the barn door so they go and ask them for advice. Jess suggests that he and Baa model the hats for Mimi. They look great but Mimi still doesn't know what they'd look like on her. JESS remembers the shadows that Baa was making earlier and suggests that she could wear a hat and look at her shadow to see what it looks like. Mimi tries it but she still can't see herself properly. It's just an outline. Undeterred, Jess suggests that they go and ask Horace for help. At the pond they meet the puppies who tel them about their new puppy friends who live in the pond. Jess realises that the puppies are looking at themselves reflected in the water. He realises that MIMI too may be able to see herself in the water. And of course she can! HORACE arrives and tell them that he's alway

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: In the Big Easy, Mena explores a charming host of plant-based Louisiana staples—vegan beignets, gumbo, biscuits and po boys—with food historian Zella Palmer and cookbook author Timothy Pakron. As an aperitif, he sips his way through a lesson in cocktails created in the heart of the grand city of New Orleans.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Mena feasts with magician and Vegas legend Penn Jillette. He explores the off-strip Sin City vegan food scene, indulging in plant-based “Beef” Wellington, sky-high waffles, and intricate dim sum, then dines with cookbook author Carleigh Bodrug.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Bathed in sunshine and Big Latin Culture, Mena learns to make classic Cubanos and traditional Puerto Rican mofongo—vegan-style. He cruises the seas with cookbook author Radhi Devlukia, takes actor Matt Murray to South Beach for mouth-watering molten lava cake, and harvests and tastes astonishing exotic fruits.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: In the heart of Japan, Mena devours plant-based sushi and ramen. He learns to cook soba noodles from scratch, home-made mochi, and takes part in a traditional tea ceremony.

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: In Saint Lucia, the twins crash Maisie’s getaway for a whirlwind of sailing adventures, jungle hikes, decadent chocolate massages, rum tastings, and endless tropical fun!

programme.title: United Plates Of America
programme.desc: In Iceland, Bonnie teams up with the twins for an epic escape—whale watching, volcano trekking, horseback riding, and inspiring eco chats under the midnight sun.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: In Dubai, Luke goes all out with adrenaline-packed dives, jetpacking thrills, golf swings, and speedboat races—then shares Potter memories over dinner…the loser picks up the tab!

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: In Poland, Sophie trades a calm weekend for a rush of adventure: trekking the towering Tatras, rafting wild rivers, uncovering a legendary salt mine, and so much more!

programme.title: The Presidents
programme.desc: In Innsbruck, the twins whisk Haley to an alpine wonderland of skiing, bobsledding, après-ski drinks, and a magical trip down childhood stardom—plus a touch of witchcraft!

programme.title: The Presidents
programme.desc: In Ireland, the twins join Evanna and her family for hurling matches, traditional dance, Potter nostalgia, and a spine-tingling countryside adventure!

programme.title: The Presidents
programme.desc: Alan explores a luxury train from Edinburgh, meets its chef, visits WWII and Jacobite memorials, strolls Morar’s Silver Sands, and learns about the West Highland Line’s engineering marvels.

programme.title: The Barbie Story
programme.desc: Alan enjoys the train's spa, visits Wemyss Bay, tours Mount Stuart on Bute, sees a rare Shakespeare folio, explores crew areas, joins wild adventures, and tours Pitlochry’s famed hilltop theatre.

programme.title: Beyonce: Queen & Country
programme.desc: Alan’s luxury train tour continues with cabin views, Culloden’s history, seal-spotting in Plockton, cattle droving tales, train driving, whisky tasting, eagle spotting, and countryside yoga bliss.

programme.title: David Attenborough: A Life On Earth
programme.desc: Alan’s rare journey sails to Iona and Staffa, tours Scone Palace and V&A Dundee, reunites with a Broadway friend, savours Oban seafood, and ends with a ceilidh and farewell over the Forth Bridge.

programme.title: Janet Jackson: The Art Of Seduction
programme.desc: Mena restaurant-hops with friends Lilly Singh and Laura Marano, indulging in plant-based French pastries, "pastrami" sammies, Thai "chicken" wings and "carne" asada.

programme.title: ABBA: 50 Years Since Eurovision
programme.desc: A diverse group of chefs create mouth-watering plant-based dumplings, fried `chik'n' sandwiches and Vietnamese `catfish'; Mena forages for lobster mushrooms and visits the oldest tofu factory in America.

programme.title: Barbie Uncovered: A Dream House Divided
programme.desc: Mena explores his Canadian backyard, discovering delicious plant-based sushi, pistachio cannolis, and pizza; he gets hands-on at a vegan cheese factory with comedian Bassem Youssef.

programme.title: The Presidents
programme.desc: In a frenzy of mezcal and spice, Mena devours a host of local delicacies: plant-based seafood, agua chile and classic enfrijoladas. Later, Mena joins a local abuela to make traditional moles.

programme.title: The Presidents
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Texas is a vegan oasis; Mena explores the off-beat Texan Capitol's surprising plant-based bounty: fried chicken, larger-than-life biscuits, short rib baos and mouth-watering vegan brisket.

programme.title: Aerial Italy
programme.desc: Mena returns to his home town and makes vegan ice cream with musician Tesher, then swings home to get a taste of his mum's Egyptian cooking.

programme.title: Aerial Africa
programme.desc: Ben’s food journey starts in the West Coast of the South Island. He meets the only NZ cranberry producer at a farm in Hokitika and travels to Blackball to learn how chorizo is made. He cooks a range of dishes at the beach incorporating these local delicacies, matched with a local beer.

programme.title: The Barbie Story
programme.desc: Ben visits High Peak Station in Canterbury and learns of their high -country farm to fork experience and tales of multigenerational stewardship. On the wild Tora Coast he meets a couple who harvest kaimoana sustainably – launching their fishing boat into the sea using a bulldozer.

programme.title: Beyonce: Queen & Country
programme.desc: Ben’s travels to Hastings and discovers a holistic fully vertically integrated approach to creating grass fed Angus beef. He ventures to the local farmers market and meets amazing local food producers, reinforcing the abundance of produce grown in the region.

programme.title: David Attenborough: A Life On Earth
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali, the greatest fighter ever, remains a global icon. His name still commands respect. Hear from those who knew him, relive his legendary fights, and explore the life of boxing’s greatest symbol.

programme.title: Janet Jackson: The Art Of Seduction
programme.desc: Bruce Willis became a star with his iconic role as John McClane in Die Hard, leading to a legendary career with over 100 films. Known for his charm and humor, his career faced a tragic setback in 2022.

programme.title: ABBA: 50 Years Since Eurovision
programme.desc: John Cena dominated wrestling for over a decade before transitioning to Hollywood, following Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson. Whether acting or wrestling, he lives by his mantra: Hustle, Loyalty, and Respect.

programme.title: Barbie Uncovered: A Dream House Divided
programme.desc: Chronicling ABBA's rise from Eurovision to global stardom, their iconic sound, record-breaking success, solo endeavors, ABBA Gold revival, and cutting-edge hologram tour "Voyage" that reunited the virtual band.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag wants to do something special for her Mom and Paw’s anniversary, so she recreates the boat cruise where her parents first met. \ Tag discovers that nothing is planned for Pawston’s 100th birthday, so she decides the town needs to rebuild the old Bonestand for a big Pawston concert.

programme.desc: When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

programme.desc: New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.desc: When the trees start losing their leaves, Phoebe begins knitting the trees in the park sweaters, but when the neighborhood kids see the sweaters they think they're a mysterious "Yarn Fairy," and they want to see her in action, making it much harder for the Dews to put more sweaters on the latest trees that have lost their leaves. / When Marcus and Harper team-up for a school project, they decide to bake something ("It's like inventing, but with food!"), only to come across multiple baking misshaps (and happy accidents) along the way that the Dew Drops must secretly assist them with.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries

But in the end, Marcus decides to take the kitty in, as his own. / Lola isn't very good at “Hide & Seek” so the Dew Drops help her improve her game. But she becomes so good that no one can find her! programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: JESS and the pups give Baa a peach to eat, thinking it will make a change from grass. But the peach is too hard. How can I make my peach soft? Asks Jess. That's the Big Question! He asks Mimi and watches her kneading clay. She explains she's making the clay soft. Jess tries throwing the peach in the air to soften it but all it does is bruise. Horace tells them that the water in his pond keeps his skin soft so Jess and the pups try to soften the peach in water. But it's still hard. They visit Willow who offers the pups some of her lovely ripe cherries. She explains that the cherries went soft and changed colour when they ripened. Jess realises it's the same for the peach. He waits for it to ripen and then gives it to Baa. It's delicious! And now Jess knows how to make a peach soft. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess, Mimi, Baa and Billie are playing a game, kicking a fir cone into a bucket. But it's so cold that poor shivering Billie can't kick properly. They need to find a way Bilie can stay warm enough. Baa's never cold because of his wool. They find a clump of Baa's wool on the ground but it just falls off Billie when Jess puts it on her – and Mimi tells them that glueing it on's a bad idea. What happens when it's summer and Billie wants to be cool? Maybe wrapping her in it, like a blanket, is the answer? It definitely keeps her warm - only problem is, she can't move! They realise that Baa wears a scarf as well. Perhaps they need a scarf for Billie? Mimi knits a tiny scarf for Billie, after twisting the clump of wool into yarn. It's perfect! Billie's toasty warm for their game of Flying Fircones. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: JESS, JOEY and JINX go to the Whispering Woods in the hope of seeing some butterflies, but the puppies are so lively and noisy that they frighten them away. JESS wonders “how can we hide to watch butterflies?” That's the Big Question! JESS decides to make somewhere to hide out of natural materials. The puppies and Jess try to build a hide out of stones but they're too heavy and all fall down. Jess thinks that something lighter might work well but when they try to build a hide out of straw it's TOO light and flies away in the wind. JESS is stuck - there must be some other material on Greendale Farm they could use. But all that's around them are trees. Jess works out that trees are made out of wood and there are lots of old wooden apple crates in Willow's Stable which will do the job perfectly. JESS, JOEY and JINX build a butterfly hide out of wooden apple crates and soon see lots and lots of beautiful butterflies. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: It's a snowy day on Greendale Farm so Jess and his friends have a race down Cherry Hill. Jess wants to win the race but he can't run as fast in the snow. “How can I go faster than Joey and Jinx?” Thinks Jess. That's the Big Question. First, Jess tries rolling down the hill like the puppies but he's not a good roller so that doesn't work. Horace shows Jess how he slides down his slide in the pond. Jess tries again at Cherry Hill but can't get going. Helped by Billie and Baa he remembers everything that Horace did - pushing off, going ‘Wheeeee! and lifting his legs up - but nothing works; he ends up sitting in the snow and not sliding at all. He needs something that will move on its own like Mimi's trolley! Jess tries sliding down the hill on the trolley but the wheels get stuck in the snow. Jess decides to take the wheels off and see if the trolley moves faster. Jess whizzes down the hill on the trolley top much faster than the rolling puppies. It's brilliant fun and he's answered the question. Yippety Ya

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: It's Harvest time and Jess and his friends are having a special harvest breakfast. But all there is to eat is grass! Jess wonders, “What shall we have for our harvest breakfast?” That's the Big Question! Baa likes juicy things to eat. Jess remembers that he saw some juicy blackberries on his way to Buttercup Meadow. He and Baa go and pick some. They taste delicious, but it's still not quite perfect. Billie wants something crunchy. Jess remembers seeing some crunchy hazelnuts on the way to the blackberries. He and Billie go and collect some hazelnuts. Juicy and crunchy is fantastic, but it's still not perfect. “What about something chewy” suggests Willow. Jess remembers that he and Billie found some chewy oats on their way to the hazelnut tree. So he and Willow fetch some oats. It's tasty but it's still a bit dry – until Jess adds the final touch - some milk. Perfect! They've made delicious juicy-crunchy-chewy-mushy muesli! And what's more, Jess has answered his Big Question. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess and Mimi are decorating hats. Mimi can't decide which of her two hats to wear – the one decorated with flowers or the one decorated with berries? It's a Big Question to answer! Baa and Billie are having fun making shadow shapes on the barn door so they go and ask them for advice. Jess suggests that he and Baa model the hats for Mimi. They look great but Mimi still doesn't know what they'd look like on her. JESS remembers the shadows that Baa was making earlier and suggests that she could wear a hat and look at her shadow to see what it looks like. Mimi tries it but she still can't see herself properly. It's just an outline. Undeterred, Jess suggests that they go and ask Horace for help. At the pond they meet the puppies who tel them about their new puppy friends who live in the pond. Jess realises that the puppies are looking at themselves reflected in the water. He realises that MIMI too may be able to see herself in the water. And of course she can! HORACE arrives and tell them that he's alway

programme.desc: Doc keeps delving into his memory and gets a clear lead to follow; Federico is entrusted to take care of a popular travel blogger, but their encounter is expected to trigger more than a few problems.

programme.title: DOC - In Your Hands S3
programme.desc: The search for Doc's memory appears to have reached a dead end; Federico finds himself under pressure in the ward; Riccardo faces a case that throws him into crisis and pushes his relationship with Martina to the limit.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6
programme.desc: Details that can risk the firm are revealed as part of a lawsuit. Jay finds that one of the firm employees is a white supremacist.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6
programme.desc: While STR Laurie is investigated by the FBI, Liz and Ri'Chard attempt to take their clients. Meanwhile, Diane is forced to expose her PT-108 treatment.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6
programme.desc: While in Frank Landau's funeral, the partners try to talk Neil Gross to stay in the firm. Neil makes an interesting proposal to Diane. Jay asks Carmen for help.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S13

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S13

programme.title: Cobra Kai S3

programme.title: Ed Stafford's Rite Of Passage (S1)

programme.title: Hoffman Family Gold (S1)

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Special Forces agent Brenner and her husband stumble upon an illegal drug compound in the woods while hiking. The drug dealers capture them, kill her husband, and leave her for dead. Not only does Brenner escape alive, she is also seething with rage and vows to hunt down all who murdered her husband and take revenge!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called “Kung Fu Stuntmen”. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the team’s downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called “Kung Fu Stuntmen”. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Jack searches for the confidence to try surgery on his throat bump, after fainting during a previous attempt. Bubbly young gym teacher Kristan has given up on love after discovering a growth on her back.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael prepares a new, fun and summery take on a beloved American dish, the tater tot casserole. Her sister Maria rounds out the meal with a homemade, seasonal berry cobbler.

programme.title: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Cheryl discovers her daughter Lauren is missing. Despite Cheryl's efforts to seek help from authorities and the media, her pleas are overshadowed by the attention given to the missing white girl's case.

programme.title: Vanished In Death Valley
programme.desc: A teenage girl goes missing when her family's car breaks down in Death Valley. Her parents will need to make unlikely allies if they are to find their daughter before she disappears forever.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: With Gordon Ramsay’s reputation on the line, the top six chefs face the ultimate challenge of taking over the world's largest Hell's Kitchen restaurant.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Meals In Minutes (S2)
programme.desc: Rachael shows how to cook hot honey chicken, a simple and enjoyable dish made with seasoned chicken thighs, which she serves with charred corn on the cob.

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Rachael is joined by husband John, as she shows how to prepare a chicken and fig dish, featured on their wedding menu. Meanwhile, Rachael's sister Maria makes a one-bowl carrot cake.

programme.title: Rachael Ray In Tuscany
programme.desc: Rachael is known for her delicious and flavourful pesto sauces of all varieties. She prepares a pesto alla trapanese, a Sicilian dish made with almonds and tomatoes.

programme.title: Oceanfront Property Hunt

programme.desc: The MasterChef contestants face off in a mystery box challenge, with a twist. Instead of ingredients inside it, this box has ingredients wrapped around it, including paper bark, cabbage and banana leaf.

programme.title: Kailan Sasabihing Mahal Kita? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is all about a marriage,which started on the wrong foot. Compromised by her boyfriend, Sharon agreed to marry family friend, Christopher, in order to save face.

programme.title: Sa Diyos Lang Ako Susuko
programme.desc: Romano disobeyed his father when he became a soldier. The old man believed that peace could only be attained if people were to avoid all forms of violence. How ironic for him then to come home and find his father murdered and the criminals unknown and unpunished?

programme.title: Takas Sa Impiyerno
programme.desc: Hell is what the residents call their town. It is because Mayor Sebastian (Paquito Diaz) virtually sees the town as his own personal kingdom.

programme.title: Ninja Kids
programme.desc: The bagets kids were off on a thrilling adventure ride with lots of laughs when a mysterious old man gave them medallions endowed with supernatural powers. Through these medallions, they could retrieve an old ninja sword from the clutches of an evil woman.

programme.title: Ang Probinsyano
programme.desc: FPJ is an honest policeman from the province who has just been transferred to the big city. He's being "promdi" makes him the butt of many humiliating jokes. Angered and challenged, he retaliates by working extra hard, and in the end proving that his being probinsyano is not the gauge to his true worth.

programme.title: Estudyante Blues (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The hit song by well-known folk singer, Freddie Aguilar, "Anak", was the basis for this light-hearted tale about campus life. Escapades of eight young men who were classmates in school but who also had to deal with their personal problems.

programme.title: Bakit Kay Tagal Ng Sandali?
programme.desc: Nina (Dina Bonnevie) and Ted (Julio Diaz) are sweethearts. Ted convinces her to accept Don Edmundo's (Eddie Garcia) suit as the old man is said to be dying anyway.

programme.title: Lihim
programme.desc: Bianca and her friends sailed off to the pristine and beautiful Palawan for a few days of fun. Living in the city had made them hungry for the isolation an island resort offers. But then, tragedy struck just when they were starting to have fun.

programme.title: Carnap King (The Randy Padilla Story)
programme.desc: The story of the most delinquent of the Padilla brothers. Randy was the problem child to his father. This conflict led him to leave and stay with his mother who love him so much. His reputation as a bad boy was stuck when he stole a car to impress a girl.

programme.title: Ang Agimat Ni Pepe
programme.desc: Pepe, the naughty ward of parish priest Padre Lusano always gets in trouble with Chino, the young farmer who owns the chickens that Pepe loves to shoot at.

programme.title: Brando Bandido
programme.desc: Would it be really a surprise if the enigmatic avenger "Brando Bandido" (Andy Poe) is actually Zardo's son, all grown-up and ready to get back at his father's killers?

programme.title: Teacher... Teacher, I Love You
programme.desc: Raul Portugis is a Physics professor from Cebu who had relocated to Manila and became a witness to a crime. This, plus the experience of handling a difficult class and being a newcomer in the big city, results in one of Redford White's funniest films.

programme.title: Hindi Mo Ako Kayang Tapakan
programme.desc: This is the story of Tacing--a woman involved in different love affairs, which resulted in endless trials and tribulations. Nardo, Tom, Ramon and Angelito, were just some of the many men who became part of Tacing's life and played parts in making her accept the reality of womanhood.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zoë. Zoë has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun, especially as it turns out that Zoë has invited all of Peppa and George’s friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up and decide to run through the paint and all over the painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing “Cuckoo!”, Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are going for a day’s cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she’s not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa’s friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and George’s teeth are lovely and clean. But George’s plastic toy “Mr Dinosaur” teeth are a bit yellow. Dr Elephant polishes Mr Dinosaurs teeth until they are bright and shiny.

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.title: ELSBETH (SEASON 1)
programme.desc: Elsbeth suspects foul play after a posh country club wedding meticulously planned by an esteemed, but shady, financial advisor, Ashton Hayes, ends in the golf cart death of the hapless groom.

programme.title: THE AMAZING RACE (SEASON 35)
programme.desc: For the first time in The Amazing Race history, teams visit the country of Slovenia. Racers will soar to new heights in glider planes, experience roadblock surprises and battle to remain in the race.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE (SEASON 5)
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down Ted McDonald. But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking…

programme.title: S.W.A.T. (SEASON 8)
programme.desc: SWAT tackles a mission with personal ties for Hondo when they race to find a group of missing students and their bus driver, Hondo's former high school football coach.

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS (SEASON 2)
programme.desc: When a naval officer mysteriously dies in the ‘90s, Gibbs (Austin Stowell) and the team travel to the small dust-blown town of Serenity, Calif., where they encounter secret-harboring residents, an uncooperative sheriff and an investigation that will reverberate for decades.

programme.title: FBI: INTERNATIONAL (SEASON 3)
programme.desc: When a disgraced former U.S. cabinet member is arrested in Vienna, the Fly Team is sent to investigate whether he and his assistant were peddling classified government documents.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE (SEASON 5)
programme.desc: A month after the evidence room bombing, Andy and Sam return from a much-needed vacation ready to work.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. (SEASON 8)
programme.desc: Inspired by the television series and the feature film, S.W.A.T. stars Shemar Moore as a locally born and raised S.W.A.T. sergeant newly tasked to run a specialized tactical unit that is the last stop in law enforcement in Los Angeles.

programme.title: THE ROOKIE (SEASON 8)
programme.desc: John Nolan, the oldest rookie in the LAPD, has used his life experience, determination and sense of humor to keep up with rookies 20 years his junior. Nearing the end of his training, Nolan now faces his biggest challenge as a police officer when he must come to terms with the choices he has made in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS (SEASON 2)
programme.desc: When an anonymous tip leads to the discovery of a young Marine’s body at a chilling crime scene, Randy believes it could be connected to a previous case where a coin was left in the victim’s throat. Also, Franks tries to track down priceless packages meant for his brother, Mason.

Nearing the end of his training, Nolan now faces his biggest challenge as a police officer when he must come to terms with the choices he has made in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. (SEASON 8)
programme.desc: Inspired by the television series and the feature film, S.W.A.T. stars Shemar Moore as a locally born and raised S.W.A.T. sergeant newly tasked to run a specialized tactical unit that is the last stop in law enforcement in Los Angeles.

programme.title: ELSBETH (SEASON 1)
programme.desc: Elsbeth goes to battle with artificial intelligence when Quinn, the young CEO of a location-based crime alert app, murders a journalist and uses her app to divert authorities and create a phony killer.

programme.title: FBI: INTERNATIONAL (SEASON 3)
programme.desc: When a disgraced former U.S. cabinet member is arrested in Vienna, the Fly Team is sent to investigate whether he and his assistant were peddling classified government documents.

programme.title: THE BLACKLIST (SEASON 10)
programme.desc: The Task Force works to infiltrate a high-stakes poker game tied to Wujing with the help of new team member, Siya Malik. Red and Cooper have opposing tactics when Agnes is bullied at school.

programme.title: NCIS: ORIGINS (SEASON 2)
programme.desc: When an anonymous tip leads to the discovery of a young Marine’s body at a chilling crime scene, Randy believes it could be connected to a previous case where a coin was left in the victim’s throat. Also, Franks tries to track down priceless packages meant for his brother, Mason.

programme.title: ROOKIE BLUE (SEASON 5)
programme.desc: A month after the evidence room bombing, Andy and Sam return from a much-needed vacation ready to work.

programme.title: FBI: INTERNATIONAL (SEASON 3)
programme.desc: When a disgraced former U.S. cabinet member is arrested in Vienna, the Fly Team is sent to investigate whether he and his assistant were peddling classified government documents.

programme.title: CORONER (SEASON 2)
programme.desc: Jenny investigates two grisly deaths in the suburbs, complicated by an unreliable witness.

programme.title: S.W.A.T. (SEASON 8)
programme.desc: Inspired by the television series and the feature film, S.W.A.T. stars Shemar Moore as a locally born and raised S.W.A.T. sergeant newly tasked to run a specialized tactical unit that is the last stop in law enforcement in Los Angeles.

programme.title: THE BLACKLIST (SEASON 10)
programme.desc: An assassination attempt on Sen. Panabaker leads the Task Force to a group of renowned pickpockets. Red sends a dangerous gift to an old friend in custody.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 20
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 20
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cloud Under The Sea
programme.desc: Lurking under the sea is a global web of fibre optic telecommunication cables, the plumbing of the internet. It's how we talk, text and stream, connecting billions of people. These cables are also the frontline of a tech war.

programme.title: Secret Science - Fear
programme.desc: "The only thing to fear, is fear itself", but is that true? And what is fear anyway? Myf Warhurst discovers that most of our fears are learned. So how do we beat them? And could they be useful?

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Blue Mountains Tardis
programme.desc: Builder Nick is hoping to build his wife Rachel the ultimate house in the idyllic Blue Mountains; a place that for the first time in her life, she can finally call home.

programme.title: Dream Gardens - Brisbane, QLD
programme.desc: After tragically losing their wife and mother to cancer, Roberto and his children are hoping that the transformation of their garden will not only bring them healing but also create an everlasting tribute to their loved one.

programme.title: Iconic Australia - The House
programme.desc: The iconic sails of the Sydney Opera House were set to revamp the image of Australia when the building opened in October 1973, but preceding this was a dramatic construction saga that could rival any opera.

programme.title: Belonging(s) - Food: From Cookshops To Cuisine
programme.desc: We check the shards from rice bowls dated back to the 1870s when Chinese cookshops dotted the goldfields, and trace how early Chinese restaurants helped create the richness of contemporary Asian Australian cuisine.

programme.title: ABC News Summer - Episode 20
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport and weather you need across summer.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Savoury Pancakes
programme.desc: Adam and guests, husband and wife Opera stars Christian Qi and Esther Song have stacks of fun with savoury pancakes.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Women In Sport Special
programme.desc: It's an all-female special on That Pacific Sports Show! Tiana and Sera celebrate women in sport with cricketer Melissa Velvel Fare and powerlifter Hani Watson.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 28
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 15
programme.desc: David Speers presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Blue Mountains Tardis
programme.desc: Builder Nick is hoping to build his wife Rachel the ultimate house in the idyllic Blue Mountains; a place that for the first time in her life, she can finally call home.

programme.title: The World - Episode 15
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: Australia's Vietnam War - Episode 3
programme.desc: As the US withdraws from Vietnam, Australia follows suit. For those who returned, the war would forever hang over their lives, through health issues like PTSD. Members of the Vietnamese diaspora speak. (Final)

programme.title: Iconic Australia - The House

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple starts to experience some terrifying incidents, including the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple starts to experience some terrifying incidents, including the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Nightmare of Darkness
programme.desc: A young actress’ Weibo account is refreshed with a new post three years after her death, disclosing her dating picture with young idol Wu Zi Zhen. Wu seeks help from the PR consultant Qiao Shen at his haunted house, but encounters a series of horrifying incidents. After being interrogated by Qiao, Wu lowers his guard and unveils a shocking secret…

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: Apartment 212
programme.desc: Jennifer moves into a new apartment after leaving her abusive husband. As she starts life anew, something keeps biting her when she sleeps, leading her to be sleep deprived, paranoid and paralyzed with fear of the unseen.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: When Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: A series of random nighttime shootings has the city of Phoenix on edge as police try to end the reign of terror and interrogate two suspects.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: After a successful businessman is brutally strangled, investigators become suspicious of his widow and her secret friend.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: For nearly a year, investigators from multiple law enforcement agencies work tirelessly to uncover a twisted tale of secrets and lies that led to murder.

programme.title: Partners In Crime (S1)
programme.desc: When the Singapore Police need help, they turn to Lim Chin Chin, the Director of Forensic Chemistry and Physics Laboratory.

programme.title: Partners In Crime (S1)
programme.desc: Watch how cyber-sleuths like Erik Laykin crack cyber crimes as well as hiring hackers to tap into the cyber underworld.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Before he hunted down his first victim in the wilds of Alaska, Robert Hansen was working at his father's bakery in a small town in Iowa, slowly developing an animosity towards women.

programme.title: Hoarders (S15)
programme.desc: Destiny refuses to leave the house and says she "basically checked out of life". The extremely hoarded house has come to the attention of the homeowners, and they want the house cleaned up.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: In 2009, Emilia Carr and her boyfriend Joshua Fulgham were convicted for the first-degree murder and kidnapping of Heather Strong, and Emilia alone was sentenced to death.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A typical Sunday morphs into a violent gunfight when two armed men invade a family's home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A local trip becomes a harrowing ordeal for one family when they're surrounded by an angry mob that attacks their vehicle; a laundromat owner is beaten by unruly patrons from the business next door.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Janie Landers disappears from a home for the impaired. When Janie's body is found, there are many suspects but it is years before the killer and the atrocities in the facility are revealed.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Janie Landers disappears from a home for the impaired. When Janie's body is found, there are many suspects but it is years before the killer and the atrocities in the facility are revealed.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When Betty Jones, 65, and Kathryn Crigler, 81, are brutally attacked in a 1990 home invasion, the tiny community of Starkville, MS, is left living in fear.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A defendant strips naked and shadowboxes during his hearing; the family of a murder victim attacks the defendant in court; a convicted gunman begs for forgiveness from a victim's family; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A grieving uncle screams at his sister-in-law in court over his missing nephew; an autoworker checks in to his virtual hearing from the assembly line; a road rage killer blames his victim; and more.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: In Gwinnett County, a beloved special education teacher is gunned down in broad daylight when the suspects' plan to score some easy money spins out of control.

programme.title: The First 48 (S26)
programme.desc: When a young soccer player is shot dead and dumped on a Gwinnett County street, Corporal Ryan Jorstad hopes retracing the man's steps will lead him to the killer.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: When a Tulsa man is killed by a bullet to the head, detectives discover guns hidden in the garage next door. The neighbor's role becomes a question in a case of cousin against cousin.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: An off-duty police officer shoots a man in the chest after a social event explodes into a deadly argument between the two men.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S5)
programme.desc: A Louisiana trail-ride dance party is cut short when shots ring out. A man dies, and his daughter's partner—who was standing nearby—is accused.

programme.title: Grade 1 Reading & Literacy

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino

programme.title: Grade 2 Math

programme.title: Grade 2 English

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan

programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento, at kung paano magsulat ng kuwento at magbigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: Know how to convert time, what are the linear, mass and capacity measures, the area of square and rectangle, bar graphs, and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: Learn more about adjectives, adverbs, maps, graphs, how to read words, and how to restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang mga gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: Find out more about people, animALS, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. Discover the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano magpahayag at magsulat ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon, sumuri ng tekstong binasa o napanood, at gumawa ng dayagram.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: Learn about the volume of solid figures, meter reading, pie graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: Know how to compose clear and coherent sentences, and write a persuasive essay.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Unawain at pahalagahan ang patuloy na pagpupunyagi ng mga Pilipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga hamon ng nagsasarili at umuunlad na bansa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: Discover the effects of of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, the weather patterns and seasons in the Philippines, the Earth’s rotation and revolution, and characteristics of planets in the solar system.

programme.title: Grade 9 Filipino

programme.title: Grade 9 Math
programme.desc: Identify the basic concepts of trigonometry.

programme.title: Grade 9 English
programme.desc: Discover the relevance worth of of ideas, soundness of author’s reasoning, and the effectiveness of a presentation, as well as critical issues that demand sound analysis and call for prompt actions.

programme.title: Grade 9 Araling Panlipunan

programme.desc: Unawain at pahalagahan ang mga karapatan at tungkulin bilang mamamayang Filipino.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: C'Est Du Belge
programme.desc: In the company of Gerald Watelet, focus on the best ambassadors of Belgian culture and heritage, on the behind-the-scenes of unmissable events and portraits of personalities making the news.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Profession Guide Animalier
programme.desc: Portrait of Baptiste Bataille, a Belgian biologist and ornithologist turned wildlife guide. From Madagascar to the Himalayas, he offers expeditions to amateur and professional photographers seeking encounters with wild animals such as the grey wolf, the golden eagle, the genet, the snow leopard, the beluga, or the polar bear.

programme.title: Outremer.Gourmand
programme.desc: To celebrate the cuisine of the French overseas departments and territories, make a date with each episode featuring a personality from the world of gastronomy. On the menu: discoveries, sharing, and an explosion of flavours!

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: In the heart of Lyon, the Musée des Beaux-Arts houses 90,000 works of art. Lucille Boitelle is an ornamental painter who creates worlds that embellish any surface. Sensual and ethereal: the show by Uruguayan designer Gabriela Hearst. In Douarnenez, ceramist Mathieu Casseau handles clay with vigour and gentleness.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Outremer.Gourmand
programme.desc: To celebrate the cuisine of the French overseas departments and territories, make a date with each episode featuring a personality from the world of gastronomy. On the menu: discoveries, sharing, and an explosion of flavours!

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Profession Guide Animalier
programme.desc: Portrait of Baptiste Bataille, a Belgian biologist and ornithologist turned wildlife guide. From Madagascar to the Himalayas, he offers expeditions to amateur and professional photographers seeking encounters with wild animals such as the grey wolf, the golden eagle, the genet, the snow leopard, the beluga, or the polar bear.

programme.title: C'Est Du Belge
programme.desc: In the company of Gerald Watelet, focus on the best ambassadors of Belgian culture and heritage, on the behind-the-scenes of unmissable events and portraits of personalities making the news.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Idéfix Et Les Irréductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idéfix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Pétole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Grandes Grandes Vacances
programme.desc: October 1939. Ernest and Colette are getting used to life Normandy. At school, they make both friends and enemies, the Morteau kids above all. It is the time of the 'phoney war', a period without fighting but rife with rumours.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Temps Présent
programme.desc: 'Temps Présent'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Objectif Monde
programme.desc: 'Objectif Monde'' proposes special reports and investigations into societal or geopolitical issues, taking the time to analyse the situations thanks to different specialist opinions. This TV5MONDE programme is produced with French-speaking partners (RTBF, RTS, Radio-Canada, France Télévisions) and the support of the public French-speaking media.

programme.title: Suisse En Scène
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! In each country we meet francophones who present, in French, their culture, way of life and commitments. The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Albanie, Le Secret Des Balkans
programme.desc: Often coveted and scarred, Albania is unique at the heart of the Balkans. Freed from the communist dictatorship in 1985, the inhabitants are catching up for lost time, with vigour and pride. From the Adriatic to the northern mountains, they are reviving their traditions and promoting their historic-religious heritage.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: Jade Boyer, owner of a vegetable farm, is found hiding at the scene of Luigi Rossi's murder, a friend of Lieutenant Jackson Bellerose. She claims she was simply in the wrong place at the wrong time.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: As the investigation progresses, suspicion increasingly falls on Jade Boyer's farm. Her husband has disappeared. Shaken by his friend's death, Jackson becomes personally involved in the case. His worst flaws resurface...

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France
programme.desc: Once he's lifted all his pots, it's time for Stéphane to head back to port and unload his catch. But for this fisherman, making the most of life also includes passing on the tradition of fishing for snow crabs, one that dates back three centuries, to his sons.

programme.title: 64' Actu
